SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS NVARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type;



-- Without using CAST option

SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      demo NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(demo)


-- Selecting particular columns

SELECT payment_type,payment_type_desc
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH(
      payment_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
  );


-- Changing column names

SELECT payment_type, description
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH(
      payment_type SMALLINT,
      description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
  );


-- Reading arrays

SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
        CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc_0        
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type;


-- Using Cross apply
SELECT  *
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH
  (
      payment_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
  )
  

-- Using second cross apply to read array 

SELECT  payment_type, payment_type_desc_value
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS payment_type
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH
  (
      payment_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
  )
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
  WITH(
      sub_type SMALLINT,
      payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
  );




-- Reading Standard JSON

SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'rate_code.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS rate_code
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH(
      rate_code_id TINYINT,
      rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
  );
